fields.name: SRAM GX 1x11 Speed Rear Derailleur
fields.description: Carefully engineered to bring you consistent and reliable gear shifts when out on the trails, the GX 11-speed rear MTB derailleur is specifically designed for use in a 1x11 drivetrain. It adopts many of the same technologies as seen on SRAM’s top-end XX1 range such as X-Horizon, X-Actuation and the Roller Bearing Clutch system. This means you’ll always have fast and precise shifts and excellent chain retention over the roughest terrain.

fields.name: SRAM X01 Eagle B148 12sp MTB Chainset - DUB
fields.description: The SRAM X01 Eagle B148 DUB DM Chainset sits at the pinnacle of the lightest, strongest and stiffest of crankset designs that are available on the market today from SRAM and is the most technologically advanced that they have ever created. Now redesigned to meet with the DUB bottom bracket/spindle system.

fields.name: SRAM X01 Eagle 1x12sp MTB Groupset - DUB
fields.description: Packed with all the same technologies and features as its XX1 Eagle model, the X01 Eagle DUB Groupset brings you high-end performance and pushes the boundaries of what is possible with a 1x drivetrain. Optimised for top-level XC and Enduro racing, it functions silently, is super-efficient and shifts with ultimate precision and reliability. Also, the chainset adopts SRAM’s revised and updated bottom bracket system called “DUB”, which provides improved integration between the crank, spindle and bottom bracket.

fields.name: SRAM NX Eagle 1x12sp Boost MTB Groupset - DUB
fields.description: The NX Eagle DUB 12 Speed Boost Groupset offers the same features, technologies and gear range as seen on SRAM’S top-end XX1 and X01 Eagle drivetrains. However, the difference with NX Eagle is that it falls within the reach of more rider’s budgets. It also adopts SRAM’s revised and updated bottom bracket system called “DUB”, which provides improved integration between the crank, spindle and bottom bracket. This particular groupset is specifically designed for 'Boost' Type frames so the chainset has a wider chainline, ensuring clearance with these frame's wider rear ends

fields.name: Shimano RT66 Disc Rotor (6 Bolt)
fields.description: Stamped from stainless steel for tough performance that lasts, the RT66 rotor is compatible with Shimano's entire mountain bike disc brake range. An ideal choice for those just getting into MTB and experienced aggressive riders, it will consistently deliver the braking power you need.

fields.name: Shimano XT RT86 Ice-Tech Disc Brake Rotor
fields.description: Shimano's XT/Saint RT86 Ice-Tech 6-Bolt Disc Brake Rotor provides exceptional stopping performance in all weather conditions. Featuring a triple-decker construction of stainless steel and alloy 3-layer to speedily disperse the heat generated from your ride, this mountain bike disc brake rotor has an outstanding lifespan and produces less noise than your average, run-of-the-mill disc rotor.

fields.name: Shimano RT76 Disc Rotor (6 Bolt)
fields.description: Shimano developed this XT disc brake rotor to get the best performance from your brake, whilst also prolonging brake pad life. This is achieved thanks to its advanced pad contact surface, which aids pad clearance. It also offers a cooling effect on the pads and brake caliper, preventing the dreaded “brake-fade” towards the end of a long descent on the trails.

fields.name: Hope Floating Disc Brake Rotor
fields.description: This Hope Floating Disc Brake Rotor is precision laser cut from a custom sheet of steel and then heat-treated to produce a high-end, durable disc rotor. Made with a wider braking surface for use with other brakes available on the market, the Hope Floating Disc Brake Rotor is suitable for performance-oriented riders and those seeking a new alternative disc brake rotor.

fields.name: Michelin Wild Enduro Gum-X TS TLR Rear MTB Tyre
fields.description: This Michelin Wild Enduro Rear Tyre provides exceptional rolling speed and grip in all trail situations while performing superbly in any weather condition. Thanks to the new Gum-X rubber compound it provides more speed and more grip than most other Enduro tyres on the market. The rear wheel specific tread profile offers terrain versatility and maximum rear wheel power-transfer traction and grip across any surface.

fields.name: Maxxis Ardent MTB Tyre (EXO - TR)
fields.description: Ready for aggressive race use, the Ardent mountain bike tyre has an aggressive dual-compound tread for reliable traction on the most challenging terrain. The large shoulder blocks bite into loose and muddy sections so you can attack the berms and corners at pace. Maxxis has also included its EXO puncture protection so you can attack rock gardens confidently. It’s also tubeless compatible for running lower pressure for even better cornering grip.

fields.name: Maxxis Minion DHF Wide Trail Tyre - EXO - TR
fields.description: Ready to tackle the toughest, loosest and muddiest terrain, the Minion DHF model is the ideal choice for downhill riders. If you're planning on racing on a challenging trail with mixed conditions or trying to set a PB at your local bike park, this is the tyre for you.

fields.name: Maxxis Minion DHR II Tyre - EXO - TR
fields.description: Completely redesigned to bring you enhanced cornering control, acceleration and braking, the Maxxis Minion DHR II Tyre - EXO - TR model will make your bike ready to take on the most challenging trails. Adopting the same larger shoulder knobs as seen on the Minion DHF mountain bike tyre, it also has a heavily ramped centre tread for fast rolling and straight tracking under hard braking. Combine your Minion DHR II at the rear with a Minion DHF up front for the ultimate trail ready setup.
